name: High Or Die
description:
This project was made in a 48-hour game jam. We wore given a word that had to reflect in the game.

 In the game, you are a  person that smoked weed. The whole world changed and all the people in the world became a pumpkin head. If the pumpkin head attacks you, you get off your high but if you attack the pumpkin head you get high again.

We tried our best. We hope you enjoy the small game.
